column1: he finds swing right away. Good-length inswinger, Kayes does not cover for the movement and squirts an inside edge to the midwicket region
too full and outside off, Kayes presses forward, drives, but can't get it past cover
there comes the inswinging yorker, hunting for the base of off stump, Kayes jams his bat down in time and toe-ends the ball to cover
pitched up on off, driven up the up to mid-off for one. Kayes finds some breathing space at the other end
full and wide outside off - probably wider than a set of stumps outside off - Sarkar loves width. He bends his knee and flays it over the top of point
wide of the crease, near yorker, swerves in on middle and leg, Sarkar jabs his bat down and keeps it out
on a length and angling away outside off, opens the bat-face and guides it towards point
Kayes shimmies out, the bowler drags his length back on the stumps, pushed to mid-on, who is hanging back
Sarkar now jumps down the track, meets a short ball. He has a big mow, does not meet the pitch, and ends up dragging an inside edge away to deep midwicket
one shimmy too many? Uses his feet, Kulasekara goes shorter on middle and leg and pings the thigh pad
Kayes steps away outside leg, this is full on middle. The batsman, having made room, crashes a drive through extra cover
and again! Kayes backs away outside leg, opens up the off side, this is full on the stumps again. Full-toss, in fact. Same treatment. The ball isn't swinging or seaming for Kulasekara
the left-hander skips out and whips a short ball down to long-on
darted down leg, left alone, leg-side wide
short on off stump, chopped away from there to backward point
slides on outside off, no turn. Kayes goes over the top again. Lifts it confidently over extra cover again
half-tracker outside off, Kayes responds with a back-foot swat to deep midwicket
quick fizzer, 102ks, hustles Sarkar for pace. Whisked to mid-on
hurled down leg. wide
Sarkar comes down the track, he is almost halfway down, looks to play across the line and misses this straight ball. They sneak a leg bye
really full and wide outside off, Sarkar likes width. He throws his bat at the ball and ends up carving it over extra cover
length ball wide outside off,  Kayes frees his arms and lofts it through the line. Up and over extra cover. Hits the ad skirting on the flush. First six of the night
full, angled in, swings in, worked to midwicket
122ks slower length ball outside off, Sarkar swishes early and misses
Sarkar hits through the line and fetches another six. Length and outside off, Sarkar sizes it up and launches it handsomely over the long-off boundary
Sarkar forays down the track, he is ready for this short ball on middle. Smacked over the covers again. 18 runs off the over. Bangladesh motoring along
length ball, slides in with the arm, pushed to midwicket on the back foot
uses his feet and clips it wide of midwicket. No turn for Munaweera
down the track and hacked to deepish mid-on off the inside half
the batsman steps away outside leg, Munaweera darts it very full and wide outside off. Crunched over the covers again
nudged to midwicket
hurled down leg, wide
Soumya backs away outside leg, Munaweera chases him with a 103.8ks dart. Smote over the long-on boundary
near yorker, really full, and dips in front of his front toe. Dug back to Malinga
full and sliding down leg, past the flick, wide
very full on middle, opens the face and squeezes a quick single to point
edged and just wide of the diving keeper. Yorker on off or just a shade outside off, squirted away to the left of Kusal, rolls away to the fence

evades the outstretched hands of a leaping mid-off. Malinga misses his length. Full and outside off,  the batsman miscues a lofted drive.  Sliced in the air. Tharanga moves to his right, does so late, and does not get a hand to the ball
Malinga attempts a cutter, grips in the surface, and bounces at Sarkar, who had no clue about this change-up. Hits the thigh
another slower cutter, Sarkar picks this, waits for the ball to arrive and turns it around the corner for a double
floated full on the pads, knocked in the gap at midwicket for a double
good length roller on middle and leg, picked off through midwicket
Asela's change-up provides Sri Lanka with the breakthrough! Slower offcutter, lobbed up on off stump, Sarkar is through with the drive. He ends up chipping a return catch
short of a length and outside off, leans back and guides it through point
full dipper on off stump, tucked around the corner
really full and outside off, driven through the line to long-off
hint of turn, length ball, drop and run in front of Malinga at point
dropped short and outside off, short-armed away to the left of deep midwicket
short and angled across off, chopped to sweeper cover on the back foot
googly, spins in, inside-edged back to the bowler

nudged off the pads straight to short fine leg. Kayes chances a single. There was no single there. It was his call. He puts in a desperate full-length dive but is caught short. Tharanga throws it flat to Kusal who swipes the bails off
looped up on off, whipped with a flourish to long-on
back of a length cutter outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
slower offcutter from Asela, Sabbir attempts a reverse sweep and is hit on the pad in front of off stump. Not sure if there was any glove on it. Given as leg bye
full on the stumps, played back
pitched up and outside off, driven down to long-off
slower offcutter on a length, Sabbir races down the track and mows it across the line. Puts Asela over midwicket
back of a length offcutter, whipped away behind square for one
Sabbir feigns to step out. This is a hurrying short ball on off, chopped to point
darted short and wide outside off, creamed away to deep cover
tossed-up legbreak outside off, flat-batted down to long-off

Dropped. Deep square leg, camping ten metres inside the boundary, runs to his right, then tumbles to his right, and parries the ball to the boundary. Tossed-up legbreak on middle, Shakib goes down on one knee and slog-sweeps it away. Sanjaya would have been better off had he stayed at the edge of the boundary
leg-stump half-tracker, Shakib moves back and pulls it fiercely to the cow corner boundary

Dropped. googly, spins away outside off, slog-swept against the turn. He skies it in the air. Munaweera tears in from deep midwicket, dives forward, but the ball pops out once his elbow hits the ground
hacked back to the bowler
length and outside off, guided to point
slower ball drifting down leg, wide
slower legcutter outside off, just 91ks, Sabbir did not pick it. He is early into the slog and the ball goes only as far as the infield
really full on middle and leg, clipped firmly to long leg
short on the leg stump, shovelled away to long leg
really full on middle and leg, sweetly flicked to deep midwicket. They take on Asela's arm for a double
slower cutter on the leg stump, flicked to deep square leg
short legcutter outside off, 105ks, Sabbir comes down the track and is fooled by the lack of pace. Toe-ended behind to the keeper
length and outside off, Shakib rolls his wrists, shuffles across off, picking the ball up over fine leg
Shakib runs down the track. This is really short and wide outside off. Shakib reaches out and flat-bats this slower ball over the covers
full and cuts away outside off, Shakib is early into the leg-side slog and only connects with thin air
seam-up, full on off, belted down the ground to long-off
full on off, not a half-volley, drilled straight down the ground past the bowler
very full and outside off, driven down to long-off
slower short ball on the leg stump, picked up and helped over short fine leg
full and angling across off from around the wicket, Shakib attempts a scoop to fine leg and does not make contact
full on off, slammed with the bottom hand to long-on
slower full ball outside off, driven straight back to Thisara
and knocks Sabbir over. Seam-up. Full, angled in from over the wicket, and tails away late. Sabbir looks to swat it away across the line. He plays all around it. He off stump takes a beating
full and on leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
full on middle, chipped over the bowler's head
full-toss on off, this is slapped forcefully over the bowler's head
slower cutter on off stump, lashed down to wide long-off. The throw from Thisara in the deep is poor, allowing the batsmen to complete the second easily
off-stump yorker, dug out to cover-point
wide yorker outside off, Shakib can't slice it away. Beaten
this is the yorker just outside off, pushed down to long-off
full-toss on middle from around the wicket, whipped to deep midwicket
very full and outside off, hit down to long-off
near yorker on middle, clipped to deep midwicket. Just 18 off the last three overs to add to the wicket of Sabbir
Hossain backs away outside leg and cuts a back of a length ball to sweeper
yorker outside leg, following the moving batsman, inside-edged onto the boot. The ball rolls back to the bowler
Shakib shimmies out. Kulasekara nails a yorker on the leg stump. Jammed back to the bowler
three yorkers in a row, this one swings in, inside-edged to midwicket
Hossain steps away outside leg, this isn't an accurate yorker. Very full on leg stump, squeezed out to the covers

full, straight, Kulasekara hits the stumps. Excellent bowling in the slog overs. Shakib shuffles across off, aims a scoop over fine leg. The length is too full for it and timbaaah. Shakib can't put bat on it
full on leg stump, twirls his wrists and whips it away to deep square leg
full on off, punched to extra cover
Hossain backs away outside leg, Malinga chases him with a low full-toss, and raps the pad

slower offcutter, 114ks. Hossain backs away outside the leg stump. Malinga follows him with the slower ball. Hossain can't get hold of the shot. He toe-ends it and clears long-on. He miscues it and gets a six
backs away outside leg, meets a full-toss and blasts it over Malinga's head
full-toss just outside leg, eased to long leg
Thisara hits the middle stump. Pinpoint yorker from around the wicket, Hossain, having backed away outside leg, can't reach out and dig it out. SL's death bowling has been impressive tonight
misses the yorker, middle-stump full-toss, pushed to long-on
full-toss, angling across off, punched to extra-cover. They set off for a quick single and make it. A direct hit fromTharanga would have been tighter
full-toss on the leg stump, slogged away to deep midwicket's right
Mushfiq pre-meditates shuffles across the off stump. Low full-toss outside off, smartly lapped away fine of short fine leg
Thisara misses the yorker again. Low-full toss on off stump, Mushfiq goes low and meatily slog-sweeps it over square leg
slower length ball on off, 111ks, slogged away to deep square leg
Mushfiq moves outside leg and down the pitch, this is another slower ball, glanced to fine leg
another dipping slower one, and Mushfiq is hoodwinked. Slower offcutter, Mushfiq is already through with his favourite slog sweep. Malinga kisses the off stump

oh dear! Mashrafe bags a golden duck in his last T20 international. Full on middle, dips at the batsman. Mashrafe looks to late-cut it down towards third man from the stumps. Poor shot selection. Malinga rejoices. The middle stump is tilted back

Malinga does it. He claims a hat-trick! This is another Malinga special. The RPS erupts. The devilish dipper, 119ks, Mehedi gone for a golden duck on his T20I debut. Full, slow, and straight. Mehedi plays around his front pad, does so early, pinned in front. This is Malinga's fourth hat-trick in international cricket. What a bowler and he has done it without the yorker; just three straight slow dippers
slower full-toss on off, guided through cover
tucked through midwicket
bouncer outside off, swishes and misses
yorker on off, dug out to cover, where the fielder fumbles. The non-striker strays out of the crease but is sent back by Mahmudullah. A direct hit could have removed Saifuddin
length and outside off, smeared to long-off
length ball on off, swiped away between deep midwicket and long-on. Kulasekara missed the yorker and was punished

Kula fires the yorker now, this is dug into the middle of the pitch. Saifuddin ventures a single. Kula runs in, attacks the stumps. Saifuddin looks to undo his steps. Kula throws the stumps down at the striker's end
slides on middle and leg, Kusal goes low and sweeps it away square of short fine leg
Kusal drags on. Flat and spins in from outside off, Kusal goes back for a chop through point but he is cramped for room. He can only drag a thick inside edge back onto the stumps
tossed up and spins into the pads, clipped to midwicket
fired faster and shorter outside off, swatted to midwicket
half-tracker outside off, swatted away this time to deep square leg
straight ball, pushed down to long-on
short and wide outside off, carved away to deep third man
hip-high short ball outside off, sits up to be hit. Tharanga duly pulls it over midwicket on the back foot
Tharanga backs away outside leg, Mashrafe follows the moving batsman with another hip-high ball, swatted away square of short fine leg. Mehedi makes a tumbling save in the deep
much shorter and outside off, Mashrafe gets away as this is chopped straight to point. There is no protection behind that fielder
short of a length and angled in outside off from wide of the crease, Tharanga now pulls and misses
Tharanga stands up tall to meet this short ball outside off and punches to cover
slides on with the arm outside off, Munaweera's first ball. He moves away outside leg and crunches it to the left of extra cover
he uses his feet again, this one comes in with the arm again, and hits the pad

another non-turning ball from Shakib. Faster one, on a length and just outside off, bounces, Munaweera goes down on one knee and skies a slog sweep. Mahmudullah runs to his right, tumbles, and completes a smart catch
breaking down the leg side, Tharanga sweeps and misses. Wide called
full and straight, blocked with a straight bat
very full on middle and leg, fired in, clipped through midwicket
lobbed up and spins away outside off, Kapu presses forward, meets the pitch, and drives it stylishly through the covers
slides on outside off from around the stumps, Tharanga cuts it away between backward point and cover. Delicious timing and placement to boot
tossed up slower, driven down to long-off
tossed-up offbreak, dips, Kapu is beaten in the air but ends up carving it over mid-off
full on middle and leg, milked down to long-on on the front foot

Dropped!Mashrafe's last night in T20I cricket gets worse. He bagged a golden duck and now shells Tharanga. Tharanga moves away outside leg, Mehedi follows him with a faster one. Tharanga still goes inside out and drives it in the air. Mashrafe at extra cover leaps, but can't hold on. Fairly simple chance
tip and run to midwicket
dragged short on leg stump, pulled to wide mid-on
hurries in with the arm, glances the pad, rolling square on the leg side
tossed up on the leg stump, Tharanga goes down on one knee and slog-sweeps the ball over square leg
short and angled in on the leg stump, just a hip-high ball, Tharanga skips back and swings a pull over wide mid-on

Mid-on now runs to his right and pouches this mistimed pull. This was short again, but much quicker. Hurries Tharanga into a pull. He can only splice it in the air. He intended to go over midwicket but ended up mis-hitting it straighter. Mehedi runs to his right and gulps this down
fired in, pings the pad

and he strikes full ball. Hossain takes it on the rebound. Full and wide outside off, Kapu drives hard, drives in the air. The ball flew to Hossain  at cover. He could not close his fingers around the fast-travelling ball. He somehow clutches the ball against his throat. The ball bobbles up and then he stretches his right hand, completing the catch
full and very wide outside off, flayed away to point. This flew towards the throat of Sarkar. He somehow hangs onto the catch. Stinging blow. SL five down inside Powerplay
short on middle, kept out. No hat-trick for Mustafiz
bouncer outside off, too high, wide
full on the pads, whipped in the air to the left of midwicket and to the right of long-on
short of a length and swerves in, inside-edged to midwicket
short of a length and outside off, punched on the up to point, where the fielder fumbles and gifts a boundary. What an over. All action
back of a length and slanted in on middle, patted to cover
back of a length on middle, moves away outside leg, opens the bat-face and guides it to deep third man
short of a length and outside off, punched on the up to cover
shovelled away from off stump to midwicket
length ball on off, kicks up from there and smacks the bottom glove of Kapu. The ball rolls to cover
short of a length and outside off, Thisara stands up tall and simply hits through the line. This pitch suits that. Punched to the right of mid-off
slid across off from around the wicket, Kapu uses the pace and late cuts it to short third man
pitched up on off, driven to cover on the front foot
tossed on up, eased to wide long-off
short on middle and leg, sits back and swats the ball to deep midwicket
whipped from off stump to long-on. Thisara pushes on for the second. The throw is to his end.  But Thisara is safe
straight ball on middle, played back
offbreak on off, defended to leg
fired on the pads, Mehedi gets away, clipped away to Mustafiz at short fine leg
tossed up and turns away outside off, tip and run to cover
Kapu races down the track, takes it on a half-volley and blasts it straight of long-on. Clean strike
fractionally short on off, whipped to deep midwicket
short on middle, pushed back to Miraz
back of a length outside off, hangs back and slices it to Sabbir at point, who dives to his right and throws immediately as Perera is sent back at the non-strikers
overpitched, right in the slot outside off stump, but he drives inside the line and is beaten
in the blockhole at off stump, jammed out from under his eyes, straight to extra cover
leading edge lands safely. Rolls his fingers on this full ball at leg stump, Perera is through the flick early and the leading edge lands in front of long-off
back of the hand slower ball at a length outside off, goes for the cut, gets a thick outside edge that loops and lands in front of a diving Mushfiqur
low full toss at middle stump, hammered to long-on's left
full toss at middle stump, too high for him to connect on the slog, rolls down to long-on
slower ball at a length, angled across off stump and well under from his attempted sweep
beautiful shot. Slower ball, full outside off. Lulls him into the cover drive but he opens the face last minute to tap it past short third man
full at off stump, this one is normal pace, he clears the front leg and drives it to sweeper cover's right
slower ball, low full toss outside, leans into this drive and finds sweeper again
full toss at the thigh, stands tall and whips it straight to long leg
slower cutter on off, shovelled away with the bottom hand to deep midwicket
wide half-volley, Kapu reaches out and slices it over point
slower legcutter very wide outside off, flashed away to the right of sweeper cover
leg-stump full-toss, whipped away to long leg
slower full ball on the leg stump, Thisara whips his wrists, picks it up and smacks it in the gap between long-on and deep midwicket
off-stump yorker, opens the face and guides it to point
darted on off stump, flat, flayed to long-off
down the track and driven to long-off
Thisara now hares down the track, takes a half-volley and drills to long-on
speared outside off, no turn, Kapu angles it to Mashrafe at short third man

Stumping chance. The TV umpire has been called in. This looks out and Thisara walks off. Thisara skipped out, Shakib was wary of it. He fired it flatter and wider outside off. Thisara can't reach out and connect with a wild leg-side mow. He loses his balance and can't ground his back foot in time. Mushfiq does the rest
Shakib now hangs it up in the air, nudged to midwicket
slower cutter outside off, 112ks, Prasanna plays early and misses
Deep square leg bolts to his left, dives, and keeps it to two. Another slower short cutter, pulled away
short of a length and outside off, gets on top of the bounce and cuts strongly to sweeper cover

Mashrafe misses a run-out chance. The batsman shuffles across off and laps it away to long leg. There is a miscommunication between the wickets. Kapu wants two, Prasanna doesn't. The throw from Sarkar is flat to Mashrafe. He is too eager to pick up the ball and disturb the stumps. He does not collect the ball cleanly and breaks the stumps without the ball. Kapu gets away
back of a length and seams away outside off, guided to point
short and wide outside off, scythed away to the left of Sabbir at sweeper
tossed up on off, turn and bounce, dabbed to cover
Third life for Kapu. Shakib shells a return catch. Nope, it just dropped short of Shakib. Low full-toss, chipped just in front of the bowler
full-toss outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
hacked away to long-on
arm-ball, glances the pad, they chance a leg bye. Mushfiq can't throw the stumps down
worked to midwicket for one
length ball outside off, cracked away to cover
back of a length and outside off, Kapu latches onto the width, flat-batting the ball over extra cover
full on middle and off, opens the bat-face and drives to sweeper cover
half-volley outside off, drilled down to the right of long-off

bowled'em. Mashrafe strikes with his penultimate ball in T20I cricket. Good length on middle, right in the slot for the big blow. But Prasanna can't connect with the leg-side slog. Mashrafe hits middle. No real celebrations from the captain
short of a length and outside off, played back to the bowler. Mashrafe finishes as Bangladesh's highest wicket-takers among seamers in T20Is
slower offcutter, Kapu attempts a slog-sweep and ends up top-edging it over the keeper's head. He brings up his maiden T20I fifty
Mustafiz gets Kapu and shuts out the chase. Rolls his fingers across another offcutter. Kapu swings at it but can't manufacture his own pace. Holes out to Mehedi at long-on
full on middle, driven down to long-on
Malinga's feet went nowhere. He just swished and missed outside off
back of a length and angling across off, Malinga swings wildly with no feet and misses again
Mustafizur gives Malinga a taste of his own medicine. This was full and quick on middle, Malinga swings with no feet. Misses and the middle stump is rattled
full and angling into the leg stump, hits the pad, sliding down leg
off-stump yorker, driven to long-off
short and wide outside off, Sanjaya carves it over extra cover and gets a four
full on off, another sliced hit over extra cover

Bangladesh send-off Mashrafe with a series-levelling victory. Mashrafe takes his cap off and takes hugs from his team-mates. Another sliced hit and long-off gets under this. Saifuddin, meanwhile, does the star man pose à la Afridi
